item.description:
Dear Members,

After taking a survey of members, it is clear that a majority of members intending to attend can come on Feb. 1st from 12NOON to 2 pm, despite the fact that Feb. 1st is also Superbowl Sunday.

So next Sunday we will meet at Especially for Pets from NOON to 2pm. It is potluck again, so if anyone can bring food or drink, please do so. If you have a chance, email me to let me know what you're bringing so everyone doesn't bring the same thing!

See you there!

Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE MEET Feb. 1st, Sunday at Espec. for Pets, Sudbury
